Title: Murder, She Wrote
Plot: Former high school English teacher and famed mystery writer Jessica Fletcher (Dame Angela Lansbury) has a gift for solving mysteries. You see, it seems murder follows her around, whether it be to the houses of her seemingly endless number of friends, nieces, and nephews, or right in her hometown of Cabot Cove, Maine. Jessica is sometimes assisted by her friend Dr. Seth Hazlitt (William Windom) or the local Sheriff, Amos Tupper (Tom Bosley) and Tupper's successor, Mort Metzger (Ron Masak), a former New York City cop. Sometimes, later in the series, Jessica would only serve as narrator. In later seasons, Jessica moved to Manhattan to teach criminology at Manhattan University.
Awards: Won 2 Primetime Emmys. Another 32 wins & 55 nominations.
Stars: Angela Lansbury, William Windom, Ron Masak, Louis Herthum

Similars.Title: Murder, She Wrote: The Celtic Riddle
Similars.FullTitle: Murder, She Wrote: The Celtic Riddle (TV Movie 2003)
Similars.Plot: Jessica Fletcher (Dame Angela Lansbury) travels to Ireland, where she becomes involved in a clue-driven hunt for secret treasure.
Similars.Stars: Angela Lansbury, Fionnula Flanagan, Tegan West

Similars.Title: Columbo
Similars.Plot: Los Angeles homicide detective Lieutenant Columbo uses his humble ways and ingenuous demeanor to winkle out even the most well-concealed of crimes.
Similars.Stars: Peter Falk, Mike Lally, John Finnegan

Similars.Title: Matlock
Similars.Plot: Ben Matlock is a very expensive criminal defense attorney, who charges one hundred thousand dollars to take a case. Fortunately, he's worth every penny, as he and his associates defend his clients by finding the real killer.
Similars.Stars: Andy Griffith, Linda Purl, Kene Holiday

Similars.Title: Diagnosis Murder
Similars.Plot: Dr. Mark Sloan has a knack for getting into trouble, negotiating the twists and turns of mysteries and solving crimes with the help of his son, Steve, a homicide detective.
Similars.Stars: Dick Van Dyke, Barry Van Dyke, Victoria Rowell

Similars.Title: Murder, She Wrote: South by Southwest
Similars.FullTitle: Murder, She Wrote: South by Southwest (TV Movie 1997)
Similars.Plot: Jessica Fletcher (Dame Angela Lansbury) is attacked on a train when she investigates the case of a missing passenger.
Similars.Stars: Angela Lansbury, Ray Baker, Cliff Bemis

Similars.Title: The Golden Girls
Similars.Plot: Four previously married women live together in Miami, sharing their various experiences together and enjoying themselves despite hard times. Spin-offs Nurses (1991) and Empty Nest (1988).
Similars.Stars: Bea Arthur, Betty White, Rue McClanahan

Similars.Title: The Love Boat
Similars.Plot: The romantic and comic tales of the passengers and crew of the cruise ship, Pacific Princess.
Similars.Stars: Gavin MacLeod, Bernie Kopell, Ted Lange

Similars.Title: Magnum, P.I.
Similars.Plot: The adventures of a Hawaii based private investigator.
Similars.Stars: Tom Selleck, John Hillerman, Roger E. Mosley

Similars.Title: The A-Team
Similars.Plot: Four Vietnam vets, framed for a crime they didn't commit, help the innocent while on the run from the military.
Similars.Stars: George Peppard, Mr. T, Dwight Schultz

Similars.Title: M*A*S*H
Similars.Plot: The staff of an Army hospital in the Korean War find that laughter is the best way to deal with their situation.
Similars.Stars: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, Loretta Swit

Similars.Title: Knight Rider
Similars.Plot: A lone crimefighter battles the forces of evil with the help of a virtually indestructible and artificially intelligent supercar.
Similars.Stars: David Hasselhoff, Edward Mulhare, Richard Basehart

Similars.Title: Monk
Similars.Plot: The series follows Adrian Monk, a brilliant former San Francisco detective, who now consults the police as a private consultant who battles with an obsessive-compulsive disorder.
